title: What factory image version should we use for France for the Pixel 4 XL?
content:
Hi,

I'm trying to install the latest version of the factory image for the Pixel 4 XL, however I'm not sure which one I should use.

I'm from France (carrier Orange), however the phone I bought is from a local reseller without any carrier link (therefore unlocked version).

I would be tempted to use the all carriers version, however on the November update the OTA was QD1A.190821.014 (which is for USA and UK). For December, should I use the QQ1B.191205.011 or the QQ1B.191205.012.A1 ?
FYI, the Google post isn't the same as what is written on the factory image download page, so kinda hard to guess.

Thanks for your help!
